about_the_game:
Phantom Chains is a dark fantasy action roguelike that combines strategic combat with fast-paced gameplay of arcade inspired indie games. Procedurally generated levels, tons of different enemies, and plenty of weapons, spells, and upgrades to find will keep every playthrough feeling fresh!

Skill Based Combat: A combination of melee, magic, blocking, and dodging for faced paced action combat

Tons of Replay Value: Randomized levels and upgrades gives each playthrough a unique experience!

Epic Bosses: Larger than life bosses made to challenge!

An Atmospheric, Surreal World: A unique dark fantasy world full of variety and surprises.
